column4: Lyth ctrl+alt+backspace doesn't work on Jaunty 9.04.. use ctrl+alt+k or ctrl+sysrq+k  one of those
Lyth or F2 and type sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart
He's got a pretty bad system freeze.  I don't think f2 and running a command are on option
Lyth then.. ctrl+alt+F2 .. log in there.. and issue the same command if possible.
